Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Data link transmission errors. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Electronic Warfare component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 08/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
